pages.text: The $(mob)Hippogryph$() is an animal found in $(thing)Mountains$(). It flies around and attacks nearby players and animals when it gets hungry using its claws.$(p)Throwing $(l:minecraft_rabbit)$(item)Rabbit's Feet$() at it while it is on the ground will tame it. After that, it can be provided with a $(item)Saddle$() to use as a mount, given armor or a $(item)Chest$() to transport items. It will also fight alongside its owner and defend it.
Tamed $(mob)Hippogryphs$() can be bred with $(item)Rabbit Stew$(), causing one of them to lay a $(item)Hippogryph Egg$(). It can be thrown to create a baby untamed $(mob)Hippogryph$().
